attributes.action: Help Single People That Work and  Live Alone
attributes.additional_details:
Many single people that live alone do so with no choice - divorce, death of partner, no family, job etc and they get very little help from the govt to help out with bills. The council tax single occupancy rate should increased to 50%.

Please sign this petition if you are single, knew someone that lives alone or yourself if you lived alone for years in the past.

We struggle to pay the bills and have some spare money.
